title: I can't login to League of Legends, is it just me or can nobody else login either
body:
I have been trying to login but i can't. It keeps telling me that i am unable to connect to the server. Is this the same for everyone else or can't anyone else log in. If you can login and it is just me then can you please help me login in.

Thanks

replies.body: It looks like things are pretty OK server side.  What is the error you're seeing?  Are you still unable to log in?
Its says that im unable to connect to the login queue. though it isnt my internet cause im using it and the internet is fine
